name: Yu Zhao
content: Expert Profile: Yu Zhao | Research Directory Yu Zhao Asst Professor Rhodes Hall CEAS - Computer Science - 0030 513-556-6845EmailDownload V-Card Yu Zhao is an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science at University of Cincinnati. He was previously an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science at University of Central Missouri. Dr. Zhao received his Ph.D.in the Department of Computer Science at University of Kentucky. You can find me here: https://androidtestbugreport.github.io/yuzhao_cv/ Hiring: I am looking for self-motivated and hard-working students to join my research group. If you are interested, send me your CV. Email: lastname 3y3 [at] ucmail [dot] uc [dot] edu Personal webpage: https://androidtestbugreport.github.io/yuzhao_cv/ Software engineering, Software testing, Natural language processing, Deep learning, Reinforcement learning, and Computer networks.
